[[File:Flag_lockpicking.gif|thumb]]
__TOC__
==Description==
[[Lockpicking]] is used for opening treasure chests attained from [[Treasure Map]]s, opening [[Paragon Chests]] and opening Dungeon Chests. It's a profitable and useful skill due to the high popularity of the mentioned chests. [[Lockpicking]] is essential for any avid [[Treasure Map|Treasure Hunter]]. Lockpicking pairs well with [[Cartography]]. Be careful after picking a lock, many chests can be trapped and it's suggested that you open them with the Telekinesis spell at a safe distance.

==Usage==
Using [[Lockpicking]] requires you to double click on Lockpicks , target the container you are trying to open, after a moment you'll hear a clicking noise or you'll fail. Lockpicks are consumable and will be used, so be sure to carry enough of them. As mentioned above, cast Telekinesis or [[Remove Trap]] to open chests prior to double clicking them to avoid accidental death. Lockpicks are purchased from tinkers.

==Recommended Leveling==
It is strongly advised that you lock [[dexterity]] at 10 before training [[Lockpicking]]. [[Dexterity]] grants a passive bonus to the [[Lockpicking]] skill, so when you reach level 94.7 you will be unable to gain any higher from tinker made boxes. This is not required but can save you the hassle of a hard point.

:0-50: Buy from NPC ([[Thieves Guild]] Master)
:50-76: A Level 50 Tinker Skill Locked Box
:76-95 A Level 95 Tinker Skill Locked Box
:95-100 Dungeon Chests or [[Paragon Chests]]
